stories.text:
My friends and family like to text each other every day while playing the NYT Spelling Bee puzzle, trading hints, etc. So I thought it would be fun to build a multiplayer game inspired by the spelling bee where people can play together. You can start a new game whenever you want and you can invite up to 3 people to play with you. You can each find words and you'll see what words your friends have found.

You can try it here: https://bee-genius.onrender.com/

I created a dictionary and generated thousands of puzzles. I tried to reach a good balance of including enough words for the puzzle to be challenging without so many obscure words that it's frustrating.
stories.title: Show HN: Bee Genius, a multiplayer word game inspired by the NYT Spelling Bee
